Issue.creator: saholman
Issue.summary: "node-vcx-wrapper" npm.org package is missing the dist directory.
Issue.description: When I run "npm install --save node-vcx-wrapper" it downloads a package.json file, README.md file and a ci directory from npm.org but the dist directory where the wrapper is actually located is not found. If I write a simple script containing only "const vcx = require('node-vcx-wrapper') it results in a module not found error.
